AContent Translation

As an Administrator use the AContent Language Manager to import language packs by uploading a pack downloaded from this page. For more about translating AContent, see the ATutor translator documentation. For those familiar with ATutor translation, AContent translation work the same way.

AContent 1.3 Language Packs
  English - UTF-8 (33 KB)
  German - UTF-8 (33 KB)
  Slovak - UTF-8 (31 KB)
  Spanish - UTF-8 (35 KB)
AContent 1.2 Language Packs
  English - UTF-8 (31 KB)
  German - UTF-8 (33 KB)
  Slovak - UTF-8 (31 KB)
  Spanish - UTF-8 (35 KB)

  English - UTF-8 (31 KB)
  German - UTF-8 (33 KB)
  Slovak - UTF-8 (31 KB)
  Spanish - UTF-8 (35 KB)
AContent 1.0 Language Packs
  English - UTF-8 (22 KB)
  Spanish - UTF-8 (35 KB)
